message.name: ERR_CITIZEN_ACCOUNT_WRONG_USER_ATTEMPT
message.locale: You are not privileged to access this page.

message.name: ERR_CASE_OWNER_SHOULD_BE_INTERNAL_USER
message.locale: Case owners should be internal users.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_MODAL_INVOKED_WITHOUT_CPM
message.locale: Functionality to display the Citizen Account provider modal requires the CPM module to be installed.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_CREDIT_DEBIT_VALUE
message.locale: An unexpected value was encountered in the Credit Debit codetable.
